physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a body of water amidst rocks and trees. The photograph captures the shining sun on some rocks, both at the background and foreground. The body of water is meandering and extends beyond the horizon.
title_text: Johore Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Bodies of water Landscape photography Landscapes
